name: Murder in the Small Town
description: A detective woman with an explorer archetype is hired to investigate a murder in a small town. Her employee is a woman with a Queen archetype who owns a hotel. While investigating, the detective meets a man with a Rebel archetype who tries to help her, and they become lovers. In the end, the detective discovers that the Rebel man is actually the murderer. The story has multiple branches, with decision points that determine which branch the story follows. The story ends with the detective becoming a hero archetype through her develop
